summary: Updated Hero.tsx and About.tsx components to replace all hardcoded text with translation keys. All contact sections including 'Premium quality carpets...', 'Get in Touch', 'Instructions:', 'Contact Information', and 'Response Time' sections are now fully translated. All translations already exist in English, Russian, and Turkmen language files. Components are now fully multilingual and will display correctly in all three languages.
current_status: All hardcoded text in Hero and About contact sections replaced with translation keys. All translations exist in EN, RU, TK files. Website fully multilingual. All parts shown in images now properly translated in Russian and Turkmen.
